Description: non-paying bidders please note--if payment/communication is not received within 24 hours it will be presumed the bidder is agreeing to cancel the bid and i will re-list the item as is allowed under ebay rules--bidders with less than 10 positive feedback please contact me before bidding A wonderful sounding 67 Gibson SG Special Re-issue from Gibson's 2007 Guitar of the Week series. This guitar is in excellent cosmetic and playing condition with original hardshell case. One very small, barely noticeable blemish on neck. Other than that in near mint - virtually unplayed condition. Description and specs from Gibson website below. Photos are of this actual guitar. What really stands out other than the reissue historically correct P-90 wind is the quality of the mahogany chosen for this guitar--the grain is beautiful Week 37 - '67 SG Special Reissue w/P90's. A truly great sounding guitar that will rock your world - Alnico 2 P90 pickups. Excellent Condition! Gibson’s beloved ’67 SG Special makes a grand re-entrance with a pair of snarling black soapbar P-90s that ensure a crisp, bright tone and miles of midrange. With the archetypal look of the Heritage Cherry finish, a bound rosewood fingerboard, and a vintage-style pickguard, this mahogany rock machine represents the combination of looks, functionality, and value that is the hallmark of the SG series. Limited run of 400 BODY Body Style:MahoganyTop Species:MahoganyBack Species:Mahogany NECK Specs:Mahogany--Profile: SGPeghead Pitch:17°Nut Width:1.695"Neck Joint Location:22nd Fret FINGERBOARD Specs:Rosewood--Scale Length:24 3/4"Number Of Frets:22 Inlays: Dot--Fingerboard Binding:Single Ply HARDWARE Plating Finish: NickelTailpiece: StopbarBridge: Nashville Knobs: Black Top Hat W/Chrome InsertsMachine Heads (Tuners):Green Keys ELECTRONICS Neck Pickup: P-90 W/Alnico 2 Magnets Bridge Pickup: P-90 W/Alnico 2 Magnets--Controls: Two Volume, Two Tone, Three-Way Switch CASE Case Interior: White Plush--Case Exterior:Black Reptile Pattern Hardshell Case Silkscreen: Silver 'Gibson USA' Logo--the case has a small drill hole in the otherwise near perfect exterior where a plaque was removed--it does not go through the case and is quite smallI will sell overseas but contact me for a shipping quote--from my zip to Spain just cost $170 (i'm as far north and west as you can get in the mainland US)thanks for looking please ask any questions prior to bidding and i will do my best to answer them--between the scans and the description there are no hidden secrets--i will ship to Europe but please ask for shipping quotes before placing a bid--i'll have to open up your country to accept bids and want to screen this process first shipping is an estimate--if you live on the west coast it might cost less--east coast will cost more but i'll eat the difference and provide a scan of the original receipt upon request--remember that insurance is $2 per $100 of declared value-- i have perfect feedback in over 4500 transactions--all my instruments are completely gone over before i offer them--this one has new strings--a clean and polish and fretboard oiling as well as a setup for my preferences-- the guitar is also for sale on Reverb as well as locally so this auction may end if sold elsewhere--
Title: Rare 2007 Gibson SG 1967 reissue GOTW #37 only 400 made Near Mint w OHSC/Candy

ConditionDescription: if an offer is accepted i will re-list the guitar for the offer amount and the buyer will have a few hours to make payment unless someone else sees it and buys it at the offered amount
